messages.title: Building a stronger economy
messages.content: The Lib Dems have made a number of commitments to policies they believe will result in a stronger economy.

messages.title: Creating opportunity for everyone.
messages.content: Stephen Rutherford and the Lib Dems are focused on creating more opportunities for all individuals, emphasizing the importance of equal opportunity.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats will borrow less than the Conservatives and cut less than Labour, aiming for a fairer society and stronger economy without sacrificing public services.
Proposing free childcare and aiming to reduce class sizes for children.
Increase NHS spending and pledge more investment into mental health services.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour Party was slated for wasteful spending; Conservative budget was critiqued.

issues.economy: Lib Dems would borrow less and cut less, striving for a stronger economy.
issues.education: Stephen Rutherford supports free childcare and smaller class sizes.
issues.health: Increase in NHS spending and more mental health services.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud that the Liberal Democrats have the very best policies to help build a stronger economy and a fairer society

quotes.text: I am proud that the Liberal Democrats have the very best policies to help build a stronger economy and a fairer society

images.caption: Images depicting Stephen Rutherford and various people

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet compares the Lib Dems' economic plans to those of the Labour and Conservative parties and highlights differences in childcare, NHS spending, and mental health investment.
